dict.acceptation: 广告，宣传；公告；出公告，做广告；

sent.orig: It is important to research advertisement language. When researching advertisement we have to study advertisement language.
sent.trans: 研究广告有其重要的现实意义，而研究广告则不能不研究广告语。

sent.orig: These website's wireless delivery advertisement must through hundred million move the advertisement media.
sent.trans: 这些网站的无线投放广告都必须通过亿动广告传媒。

sent.orig: Past N year since, network loot a few advertisement of newspaper, graph article advertisement comes over.
sent.trans: 过去N年以来，网络抢夺了报纸的一些广告、图文广告过来。

sent.orig: A lot of advertisement advocate according to TV ad piece thinking will understand network video advertisement.
sent.trans: 很多广告主按照电视广告片的思维来理解网络视频广告。
